caption.p: TCGA APA analysis. TCGA APA events were grouped based on CPSF1 median mRNA expression score (high vs. low) to compare the APA between patient groups. Four representative genes showed statistically significant differences including RNF14, FAM177A1, MED29, and TUBA1A. Statistical analysis was performed using Studentâ€™s t-test.
